casebody.data:
State
v.
Michael A. Sorbello 406P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Michael A. Sorbello, for Sorbello, Michael A. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of October 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
